content.text: I'm from California, I love sushi, and I'm a meatatarian.
I love to spend time with my loved ones. I'm a cosplayer and I have a bakery to help me cope with my mental health.
Cool! I love spending time with my dog, and I like to read.
I've heard good things about it. I'll have to check it out.
I like to cosplay too, but I'm not very good at it.
It's not about being good at it, it's about having fun!
It's a great way to express yourself and connect with other people.
I agree. I think I'll start cosplaying more often.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
